Thank you for providing the information and log. Your log suggests the exception occurs (For that reason, the application will not launch correctly). 
Please delete the doccano volume and confirm the application launch correctly. If performance is slow despite a successful startup, please raise a new issue.

related issue (already solved) https://github.com/doccano/doccano/issues/965
